attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P's get £400 each month to spend on food and every M.P claims the full amount. What are they living on Lobster and Caviar? The food allowance needs stopping and also the cheap alcohol in Westminster bars.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
